item.description: Is there a mindfulness meditation for the specific feeling of being fortysomething and not wanting to ask your father for a ride to a meetup where three years ago you met a woman you liked but never followed up with, and who knows if she‚Äôs going to be there this time?

item.description:
So much for David Eby becoming the next premier of B.C., I assume. https://t.co/vkvKDNO3SP

Maybe he doesn‚Äôt actually want the job.

I sometimes catch myself thinking that becoming the leader of a political party is a punishment rather than an achievement.

item.description:
It used to be that you could look on Facebook to see who you knew that was in the town you‚Äôre currently in. Now you have to ‚Ä¶ I don‚Äôt know. How does one do that nowadays?

What I‚Äôm trying to say is, it‚Äôs hard to feel a strong connection to a place if you don‚Äôt have any friends who live there.
item.source:markdown:
It used to be that you could look on Facebook to see who you knew that was in the town you‚Äôre currently in. Now you have to ‚Ä¶ I don‚Äôt know. How does one do that nowadays?
What I‚Äôm trying to say is, it‚Äôs hard to feel a strong connection to a place if you don‚Äôt have any friends who live there.

item.description: @joshtpm I first saw this with Paul Ryan, and thought it was because he purposely wore suits that didn‚Äôt fit him because he thought men who buy suits that don‚Äôt fit them would identify with him. https://t.co/BK5oPHB9gD
item.source:markdown: @joshtpm I first saw this with Paul Ryan, and thought it was because he purposely wore suits that didn‚Äôt fit him because he thought men who buy suits that don‚Äôt fit them would identify with him. https://t.co/BK5oPHB9gD

item.description: @toddsieling Sounds right to me. It came to my mind because a woman running in Toronto, in my ward, did just that, i.e. was a high-profile school trustee and is now running for council. I also thought of the former Vancouver councillor with the initials AR.
item.source:markdown: @toddsieling Sounds right to me. It came to my mind because a woman running in Toronto, in my ward, did just that, i.e. was a high-profile school trustee and is now running for council. I also thought of the former Vancouver councillor with the initials AR.

item.description: @toddsieling Since school boards are often a springboard to council, and they own/manage a lot of real estate, I make sure I know who the trustee for my area is, what they stand for, etc.
item.source:markdown: @toddsieling Since school boards are often a springboard to council, and they own/manage a lot of real estate, I make sure I know who the trustee for my area is, what they stand for, etc.
